text:
When trying to connect using Digest as the auth type I am unable to connect.  However, if I use Basic it 
works fine.  Ive tried 2.0.x, 2.2.2 & 2.2.4 and they all do the same thing. Here is what I get in the 
error_log...

access to /dav/ failed, reason: verification of user id '<null>' not configured

Thanks
creator: apache@funkyrhythm.com
